exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="bg_jpg" height="800"/>
	<e:Group height="769" width="480" bottom="31">
		<e:Image id="ball" source="ball_png" y="561" anchorOffsetX="48" anchorOffsetY="48" width="135" height="135" x="233"/>
		<e:Image id="hand" source="hand_png" x="207" y="532"/>
		<e:Label id="tipLabel" text="向前滑动投球" y="719" width="241" height="51" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" x="120"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MessageBoxSkin" width="300" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="messageBox_png" y="11" x="6"/>
	<e:Label id="msgLabel" text="网页已断开" x="27" y="21" width="245" height="90" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" multiline="true" size="25" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultPanelSkin" width="300" height="200" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="messageBox_png" y="9" height="225" x="5"/>
	<e:Label text="游戏结束" y="33" width="179" textColor="0xEF0303" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Label text="得分：" x="82" y="86" width="90" height="48" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="微软雅黑"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="999" x="165" y="96" width="65" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Label text="扫描二维码重新开始游戏" y="144" width="249" size="20" fontFamily="微软雅黑" textColor="0xE78F55" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" x="26"/>
</e:Skin>
